participant_1.background:
I enjoy listening to Katy Perry while I cook and lift weights.
i have a boyfriend who lives in italy.
I read a book with my cats every morning before breakfast.
i only eat at restaurants.
I'm not the most graceful person, and I've been known to trip over my own feet.

participant_2.background:
I usually do my laundry every other day, but sometimes I have to do it more often if I have a lot of dirty clothes.
I've spent way too much money on gummy worms.
i have tried 35 different types of beer in my lifetime.
I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
my favorite season is duck hunting season.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
Hi! My day is going well so far. I just got back from duck hunting season.
Oh, that sounds fun! I've never been duck hunting before.
It's a lot of fun! You should definitely try it sometime.
I would love to try it! What's your favorite part about it?
I love being outdoors and being in nature. I also love the challenge of trying to shoot the ducks.
That sounds really fun! I'm glad you're having a good time.
Thanks! I'm trying to spend as much time with my sister and Charlie as possible.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good relationship with them.
They're the best! I'm so lucky to have them in my life.
I'm sure they're lucky to have you in their life too!
Thanks! I like to think so.
So what do you do for fun when you're not hunting?
I like to go fishing, play video games, and watch movies.
That sounds like fun! I like to do a lot of the same things.
Great! We should get together sometime and do something fun.
I would love that! Let's exchange numbers and we can plan something.
Sounds good! I'll send you a text later.
